price: A lõkacin da kuke hawan dũtse, gudãne. Kuma ba ku karkata a kan kõwa ba, alhãli kuwa Manzon Allah nã kiran ku a cikin na ƙarshenku.* Sa'an nan (Allah) Ya sãkã muku da baƙin ciki a tãre da wani baƙin ciki. Domin kada ku yi baƙin ciki a kan abin da ya kuɓuce muku, kuma kada ku yi baƙin cikin a kan abin da ya sãme ku. Kuma Allah Masani ne ga abin da kuke aikatãwa.
arabic: ۞ إِذۡ تُصۡعِدُونَ وَلَا تَلۡوُۥنَ عَلَىٰٓ أَحَدٖ وَٱلرَّسُولُ يَدۡعُوكُمۡ فِيٓ أُخۡرَىٰكُمۡ فَأَثَٰبَكُمۡ غَمَّۢا بِغَمّٖ لِّكَيۡلَا تَحۡزَنُواْ عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمۡ وَلَا مَآ أَصَٰبَكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: * Bãyan da hankalinsu ya kõma gare su sai suka ga sakamakon sãɓãwa umurnin Allah, ya zama karyewar yãƙi da rashin ganĩma.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
